input_text.Prompt:
The following is a product description written by our marketing expert using the following item specifications and item name.

Item name:
Blazin Roxx Girl's Sequin Boot Slippers, Faux Fur

Item specifications:
Faux Fur
Soft soles for indoor wear
Faux fur
Boot style
Sequins
Slip on

Product description:
input_text.Response A: The Hot Wheels Fun In The Tub Playset will make your kid eager for bath time, with a steep track that easily attaches to the tub with suction cups.  The child will be thrilled to watch the included car hurtle down the track through the included attached flames when they tip the water filled cup which propels the car.
input_text.Response B: Stay warm and comfy with these fashionable Blazin Roxx Girl's Sequin Boot Slippers.  They are consciously designed with faux  fur and shiny sequins.  These slip on boot style slippers are constructed with soft soles for comfortable inside ear.

label_annotations.feedback: I would be very upset with the response A because it has nothing to do with my product
